review.comment_positive: I loved everything about this place.  My room was perfect, great food and a very lovely host ğŸ˜ğŸ¤—

review.rating: Great spot for comfort close to a pond
review.comment_positive: The staff was extremely polite and helpful, with coconuts on arrival. Room super spacious and comfy.

Our stay at BÃ¬nh An Village was great! The staff was very nice and always made sure that we felt comfortable. They helped us with every question we had. The location itself and the room were lovely and we loved this little oasis. The food at the restaurant was delicious too. And what also was great: there was a SPA belonging to the rdsidence where I had the best massage I've ever had - highly recommended!
The location was a little bit outside of the city center. Therefore, the neighbourhood was quiet and we git also bikes provided with which we could get easily around.

The staff spoke very little English but with the aid of Google translate we got by.  

Unfortunately there was no evening meal option and it was very far to walk for dinner.  

My partner became unwell whilst there and we could not travel back to go chi min city by bus so we needed a private taxi, the young man at the accommodation organised for us.   We were very grateful.
review.comment_negative: Location.   It was too far from anywhere else
